Package it.polimi.ingsw.model.Resources

Class Shelf

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.model.Resources.Shelf
Direct Known Subclasses:
LeaderShelf
public class Shelf
extends java.lang.Object
this class represent a single shelf of the dashboard

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    Shelf​(int capacity)
    this constructor initialise an empty shelf

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean addResource​(Resource toAdd)
    this method add one resource in shelf when the resource is of the same type of the type of the shelf and if the shelf is not full, do anything otherwise
    int getCapacity()
    getter method for private attribute capacity
    int getFreeSlots()
    this method return the free resource slots of the shelf
    CollectionResources getResources()
    getter method for private attribute resources
    ResourceType getResourceType()
    this method get the type of the resources stored in the shelf, null if the shelf is empty
    boolean isEmpty()
    return true when the shelf is empty
    void removeAll()
    this method empty the shelf
    int removeResource​(Resource toRemove)
    this method remove resource from the shelf when it is contained in the shelf
    java.lang.String toString()

    • addResource

      public boolean addResource​(Resource toAdd)
      this method add one resource in shelf when the resource is of the same type of the type of the shelf and if the shelf is not full, do anything otherwise
      Parameters:
      toAdd - resource
      Returns:
      true when the resource can't be added, false when it can be added

      Parameters:

      Returns:
      the new size of the shelf
